definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Asnappar, who transported peoples to Samaria Ezr 4:10; Asennafar, LXXL Salmanassa/rhx; prob. = As. kg. Ašurbanipal (B.C. 668–626), i.e. [[נפל]]([[רב]])[[אס]], Gelzer:Äg. Zeitsch. 1875, 78 COT:ad loc. Mey:E Jud 29 f. Zim:KAT 3. 351 Berthol ad loc. Ency. Bib.:342.
